function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of physical exercise during the covid-19 lockdown causing physical health problems and susceptibility to severe form of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of facilities and time constraints due to quarantine, self-isolation, and lockdown hindering physical activities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inhibited social interaction due to social distancing may exacerbate psychological distress.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical activity and group physical activity due to social distancing measures.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced physical activity during covid-19 may lead to higher levels of loneliness, sadness, and anxiety.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in exercise behavior for male individuals during the pandemic.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Passive exercise behavior in young people","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on mental health and exercise behaviors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on remote or face-to-face supervision for exercise","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of social support may lead to decreased physical activity, impacting overall health and well-being.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in living environments impact physical activity levels, potentially leading to disparities in health outcomes.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of robust research and data collection may limit the understanding of the role of physical activity in maintaining mental health during pandemics.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical activity due to pandemic restrictions leading to physical and mental health issues","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of specific demographic groups to negative effects of restriction measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to internet prevents adoption of online supervised exercise in low- and middle-income countries.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Different types of exercise may have varying stress-buffering effects on mental health, affecting different groups of people under different health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Highly communicable disease covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor management of key risk factors due to covid-19 response measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative impact on the nutritional status of women and children","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential effect on maternal nutrition, micronutrient deficiencies, intrauterine growth, and downstream impacts on maternal and child health
